title: Snikket Helm Chart Values
description: Settings for the Snikket Helm Chart

domain.title: Snikket Domain
domain.description: Main domain name of your Snikket instance.

adminEmail.title: Administrator Email
adminEmail.description:
An email address where the admin can be contacted.
Also used to register your Let's Encrypt account to obtain certificates.

issuer.title: Certificate Issuer Reference
issuer.description: Reference to a [cert-manager](https://cert-manager.io/) ClusterIssuer from which to acquire certificates.

portalSecret.title: Portal Secret Key
portalSecret.description: Used to guard forms and sessions. Rotating breaks sessions.

repo.title: Container Repository
repo.description: Container repository to pull images from.

webDiscovery.title: Enable Discovery via XEP-0156 for Web clients
webDiscovery.description: Whether [XEP-0156](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0156.html) routes are enabled, as needed by web clients in order to locate and connect to the WebSocket or BOSH endpoints. Note that this may require setting the Ingress Nginx setting [`"strict-validate-path-type"`](https://kubernetes.github.io/ingress-nginx/user-guide/nginx-configuration/configmap/#strict-validate-path-type) to `"false"` due to [this bug](https://github.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx/issues/11176).

storage.title: Storage method
storage.description: Whether to use a simple file based database (`files`) or SQLite3 (`sqlite`). Automatically migrates existing data if changed.
